  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2856</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">American Embassy Calling</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Amerikanisches Botschaft Benennen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ambassade Appelle Américain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Embassy Chamada Americana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ambasciata Chiamare Americano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αμερικανική κλήση πρεσβειών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Embajada El Llamar Americano</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for an activity where students listen to arecorded message from the American Embassy and convey the information. Includes an assessment Rubric.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">listening activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">recording</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">message</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interpretation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hören zu, ein Lektionplan für eine Aktivität, 
der Kursteilnehmer arecorded Meldung von der amerikanischen Botschaft 
und übermittelt die Informationen. Enthält eine Einschätzung 
Rubrik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour une activité où les 
étudiants écoutent arecorded le message de l'ambassade américaine 
et donnent l'information. Inclut une rubrique d'évaluation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para uma atividade onde os 
estudantes escutassem arecorded a mensagem do embassy americano e faz 
saber à informação. Inclui um rubric da avaliação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per un'attività dove gli 
allievi ascoltano arecorded il messaggio dall'ambasciata americana e 
trasporta le informazioni. Include una rubrica di valutazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια δραστηριότητα όπου οι 
σπουδαστές ακούνε το μήνυμα από την αμερικανική πρεσβεία και 
μεταβιβάζει τις πληροφορίες. Περιλαμβάνει μια ρουμπρίκα 
αξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para una actividad donde 
los estudiantes escuchan arecorded el mensaje de la embajada americana
y transporta la información. Incluye una rúbrica del gravamen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hörende Aktivität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufnahme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meldung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Deutung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einschätzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">activité d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enregistrement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">message</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">traduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
